welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Jordan, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the wonderful attractions this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Provo Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
